short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take a musical break with Fryderyk Chopin and discover surprising fun facts about his life

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover the incredible connections between Chopin and the world, while browsing the web. 

This extension is an intuitive way to expand your knowledge on the composer's life, passions and influences on other artists for generations.

Need a musical break? Navigate to Wikipedia and let Chopin take you on a sonified wellbeing journey.

Disclaimer: This extension uses Google Analytics to collect extension usage statistics to help improve user experience. 

For more information on privacy and the security of your data please visit www.onemorestud.io/privacy/PrivacyPolicy.pdf.

Created with support from Google Arts & Culture.
